hadiths.text: Narrated `Ali:I used to get the emotional urethral discharge frequently so I requested Al-Miqdad to ask the Prophet (ﷺ) about it. Al-Miqdad asked him and he replied, "One has to perform ablution (after it)." (See Hadith No)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ اسْتَحْيَا فَأَمَرَ غَيْرَهُ بِالسُّؤَالِ
chapter.eng-name: Whosoever felt shy (to ask something) and then requested another person to ask on his behalf
